subject: Football (College)
Track and Field
College Football Playoff National Championship
lead_paragraph: Ohio State wide receiver Devin Smith, who is expected to lead the Buckeyes’ receiving corps in the national championship game, is also a track and field standout.
snippet: Ohio State wide receiver Devin Smith, who is expected to lead the Buckeyes’ receiving corps in the national championship game, is also a track and field standout.
